bill.summary:
I-70 Detour Act
This bill requires the Department of Transportation to submit to Congress a report with recommendations for significant improvements and potential alternatives to offset extended closures associated with Interstate Route 70, including at least one alternative to improve the resilience of Interstate Route 70 and reduce risks from nearby hazards.
The report must include information regarding the cost and feasibility of each alternative or improvement described in the report.
